issues.title: Pro-Life Stance
issues.description: Strong conservative pro-life position, supporting restrictions on abortion and opposing federal funding for abortion services
issues.source: Campaign website and congressional voting record

issues.title: Border Security
issues.description: Supports increased border wall construction and stricter immigration enforcement

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Opposes gun control legislation, supports expansive gun ownership rights

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Opposes government-run healthcare, supports market-based healthcare solutions

issues.title: Energy Policy
issues.description: Supports fossil fuel production, opposes Green New Deal, advocates for domestic energy independence

issues.title: Education Reform
issues.description: Supports school choice, opposes federal overreach in education policy

issues.title: Tax Policy
issues.description: Supports lower corporate and individual tax rates, opposes tax increases

issues.title: Foreign Policy
issues.description: Strong support for Israel, hawkish stance on national defense, critical of Iran nuclear deal
